ygData.subject: RE:  Disturbing thoughts.....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Wasn t there, so I cannot say exactly what it was.  But I heard the Head GM confirmed that once the item was taken from the cleric, it was in fact King
ygData.messageBody:
> P.S. Harm the Tranix crown is definitely NOT (caps just for you) no drop.
> the only things no drop on FGs are mithril torque and mask and skarlon
> sword. did that cleric loot one of those?

Wasn't there, so I cannot say exactly what it was. But I heard the
Head GM confirmed that once the item was taken from the cleric, it
was in fact King Tranix's Crown and it was nodrop. Where it was a
bug or not, the GM had to remove the crown from the cleric's inventory
to destroy it. That's what I heard anyway. It could be like the mask
or guise, same item - changed properties, old ones left intact.

Everyone I know however says the crown is most definitely tradable,
but none of them have looted a crown within the past 2 weeks. Did
your server get a crown in the last two weeks? Could it have been
changed? I also heard only plate classes can wear the new one.

Harm.
